trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_SEQ_00<tab>You feel the call of the road, but when a mishap strikes, Nazyl Duzyl has one more call on your time.

TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_SEQ_01<tab>One of a pair of researchers excavating a lakeside site has fallen down a hole. Nazyl Duzyl bids you head west and deliver a length of thick rope to the wrought researcher that awaits assistance for his learned colleague.

TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_SEQ_02<tab>Once given the rope, the researcher trades his anxiety for resoluteness. He orders you to leave the rescue to him and take an urgent message to Kakamehi in Revenant's Toll: send medicines.

TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_SEQ_03<tab>Having delivered the message to Kakamehi, your work is done. Kakamehi is dispatching the potions and liniments even as you settle in for a well-earned rest. Another day, another job well done.
TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_TODO_00<tab>Give the rope to the wrought researcher.
TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_NAZYLDUZYL_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how fortunate to have you here! One of the researchers excavating the lakeside has tumbled down a hole!
TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_NAZYLDUZYL_000_001<tab>He remains there still and has wounds that will need tending, but his team traveled quite light. They lack the necessary supplies for his rescue.
TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_NAZYLDUZYL_000_002<tab>Will you take this length of rope to the lakeside, for the rescue?
TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_NAZYLDUZYL_000_003<tab>After that, you must hasten to Revenant's Toll and tell Kakamehi to dispatch medicines thither.
TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_NAZYLDUZYL_000_004<tab>We are already much in your debt, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, if not in gil then in spirit─but may I impose on you one last time?
TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_NPCA_000_010<tab>Hallo! Thank the Twelve you're here! He fell right down this hole, thinks he broke a leg.
TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_NPCA_000_011<tab>We have to get him out before he passes out again─the pain seems to be bad. Have you any rope?
TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_NPCA_000_020<tab>Good and stout! Right, I can fish him out by myself here. But once he's out, he'll need some true physicking.
TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_NPCA_000_021<tab>Go on to Revenant's Toll and tell them to send potions─buckets of them!
TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_NPCA_000_025<tab>I'll fish him out by myself. You go on to Revenant's Toll and tell them to send potions.

TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_KAKAMEHI_000_030<tab>Long time no see, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! They keeping you busy at Saint Coinach's Find? Ah, an accident, eh? Not enough physick, sure, sure.
TEXT_GAIUSC508_00996_KAKAMEHI_000_031<tab>I'll get what's needed to the Sons. You look like you ran all the way─go sun those soles, you've earned a rest.
